title: Vin
content: Vin is the main protagonist of the first Mistborn trilogy, a skilled Mistborn with powerful Allomancy abilities.

comments.author: 63e8e9d8f86d4e25c9a1b114
comments.content: Vin is one of the best characters in the Cosmere.

title: Allomancy
content: Allomancy is a form of Investiture that allows individuals to gain powers by ingesting and burning metals.

title: Kelsier
content: Kelsier, known as the Survivor, is a charismatic Mistborn who inspires others to overthrow the Lord Ruler.

title: Kaladin
content: Kaladin is a former soldier who becomes a Windrunner and one of the main protagonists in the Stormlight Archive.

title: Shardplate
content: Shardplate is magical armor worn by elite warriors, enhancing their strength and durability.

title: Odium
content: Odium is a Shard in the Cosmere, representing hatred and conflict and posing a significant threat in the Stormlight Archive.

title: Iron Man
content: Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man, is a billionaire inventor and a founding member of the Avengers.

title: Infinity Stones
content: The Infinity Stones are six powerful artifacts controlling fundamental aspects of existence.

comments.author: 63e8e9d8f86d4e25c9a1b115
comments.content: The Infinity Stones are pivotal in the MCU story arc.

title: Thanos
content: Thanos is a powerful Titan who seeks to bring balance to the universe by collecting all the Infinity Stones.

title: Star-Lord
content: Peter Quill, known as Star-Lord, is the leader of the Guardians of the Galaxy and a skilled pilot and fighter.

title: Rocket Raccoon
content: Rocket is a genetically modified raccoon and a key member of the Guardians, known for his engineering skills.

title: Groot
content: Groot is a tree-like being and close friend of Rocket who can only say the phrase 'I am Groot.'

title: Pikachu
content: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon, the franchise's mascot, known for its lightning abilities.

title: Poké Ball
content: Poké Balls are devices used by trainers to capture and store Pokémon.

title: Ash Ketchum
content: Ash Ketchum is a Pokémon trainer from Pallet Town on a journey to become a Pokémon Master.
